info.name: Vk gruvbox with accents
info.description: Version of https://userstyles.org/styles/136126/vk-gruvbox with accents from gruvbox color scheme.
info.additionalInfo:
Color scheme: https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox-contrib
Original css: https://userstyles.org/styles/126419/vanilla-dark-2
Rewritten by essir. I'd recommend to use this with my other styles: https://userstyles.org/users/378866
Feel free to edit this theme and provide feedback, my telegram: @forestpraiser
